hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir said:"The Messenger of Allah stoned the Jamrat on the Day of Sacrifice in the forenoon, and after the Day of Sacrifice he stoned (the Jamarat) When the sun had passed its zenith

chapter.ara-name: باب وَقْتِ رَمْىِ جَمْرَةِ الْعَقَبَةِ يَوْمَ النَّحْرِ
chapter.eng-name: The Time For Stoniong Jamratul 'Aqabah On The Day Of Sacrifice
